content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Crude Oil Extraction, Refining and Power Generation Structure at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- PumpJack (position: 17.5, 40.5) extracting crude oil
- StorageTank (position: 12.5, 40.5) storing crude oil
- Boiler (position: 22.5, 41.0) generating steam
- SteamEngine (position: 26.5, 41.5) generating power
- OilRefinery (position: 17.5, 45.5) processing crude oil
- OilRefinery (position: 12.5, 46.5) processing crude oil
- Pipe (position: 15.5, 40.5) connecting PumpJack to StorageTank and OilRefinery
- Underground Pipe (position: 14.5, 40.5) connecting PumpJack to StorageTank
- Underground Pipe (position: 12.5, 40.5) connecting PumpJack to OilRefinery
- PipeGroup connecting PumpJack to StorageTank (positions: 11.5, 38.5 to 18.5, 38.5 and additional pipes at 14.5, 40.5; 15.5, 40.5)
- PipeGroup connecting Boiler to SteamEngine (positions: 22.5, 39.5 to 29.5, 39.5 and 29.5, 41.5)
- ElectricityGroup connecting SteamEngine to PumpJack and OilRefinery (poles at positions: 26.5, 43.5; 20.5, 41.5; 22.5, 43.5)
- StorageTank (position: 17.5, 50.5) storing petroleum gas

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when placing entities:
  - Could not place pipe-to-ground at (16.5, 40.5) because there is an existing object in the way. Ensure the target location is clear before placing an entity.
  - Could not place pipe-to-ground at (12.5, 40.5) because there is an existing object in the way. Ensure the target location is clear before placing an entity.
  - Could not place pipe at (15.5, 40.5) because entity already exists at the target position. Remove the existing entity before continuing.
  - Could not place pipe-to-ground at (14.5, 40.5) because entity already exists at the target position. Remove the existing entity before continuing.
  - Could not place pipe at (13.5, 45.5) because there is an existing object in the way. Ensure the target location is clear before placing an entity.
* Errors when using undefined variables:
  - NameError: name 'entity' is not defined. Ensure that all variables are defined before using them.
  - NameError: name 'to' is not defined. Ensure that all variables are defined before using them.
* Errors when using incorrect arguments:
  - ValueError: The first argument must be an Entity or Prototype object. Ensure that the correct type of argument is passed to the function.
* Tips:
  - Ensure that the entity has the attribute or method you are trying to access.
  - Check if the entity is valid and if the inventory can be inspected before attempting to inspect it.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
